thread.section_title: The Dog's Doodahs Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of thedogsdoodahs.com
thread.title: Judith
thread.title_full: The Dog's Doodahs reviewed by Judith

author: Judith
title: Judith
text:
Dog's Doodahs let you use your own photos on cards - I really like that, and the people that receive them really like it too. My husband has kept every one I've ever sent him. I've had cards from Moonpig, but Dog's Doodhas seem better quality.
The site is easy to use and I like the witty approach but...
1. it doesn't work with Edge, I have to revert to Internet Explorer (bah!)
2. they don't have very many card designs which devote maximum space to your own photos so I am coming close to recycling now (double bah!)
If they could sort out these two niggles I would give them five stars and my perpetual business.
